teacherRegistration.requestTeacherAccoun: Fill in the following forms to request an account. You will need to confirm your email address before your account is approved. The approval process may take up to one day after you have confirmed your email address.
teacherRegistration.usernameStepRealName: Please do not use any portion of your real name in your usernames. Usernames containing names are subject to immediate deletion.
teacherRegistration.nameStepDescription: Tu nombre no será mostrado públicamente y será almacenado con confidencialidad y seguridad.
teacherRegistration.phoneStepDescription: Your mobile number will not be displayed publicly, and will be kept confidential and secure
teacherRegistration.phoneConsent: Sí, el Scratch Team puede llamarte para verificar mi Cuenta de Profesor si es necesario
teacherRegistration.validationPhoneNumbe: Por favor, introduce un número de teléfono válido
teacherRegistration.phoneSecurityNotice: To secure your account, we will send you a one-time passcode to verify it’s really you.
teacherRegistration.validationPhoneConse: Debes aceptar la verificación de tu cuenta de maestro
teacherRegistration.privacyDescription: Tu información no será mostrada públicamente, y será almacenada con confidencialidad y seguridad
teacherRegistration.useScratchStepDescri: Cuéntanos un poco sobre cómo planeas usar Scratch. Por qué te preguntamos por esta información
teacherRegistration.useScratchMaxLength: La descripción debe contener como mucho 300 caracteres
teacherRegistration.howUseScratch: ¿Cómo tienes pensado utilizar Scratch en tu organización?
teacherRegistration.emailStepDescription: We will send you an email from no-reply@scratch.mit.edu to verify your email address.
Once you confirm your email, we will proceed with reviewing your request for a Teacher Account.
teacherRegistration.reviewProcess: The review process may take up to 24 hours.
teacherRegistration.confirmYourEmailDesc: Please check your inbox for a confirmation email from no-reply@scratch.mit.edu to verify your email address before your account can be approved.
teacherRegistration.confirmYourEmailFire: Many schools use email firewalls. To prevent delays in approving your account, please ask your school's IT department to whitelist no-reply@scratch.mit.edu. This will ensure that you can get automated emails from Scratch in the future, which you'll need for things like changing your or your students' passwords.
